items.content_html: Textify is a lightweight real-time chat application designed for quick and easy conversations. It allows users to join and chat instantly which is ideal for testing, learning or internal team demos, Textify focuses on core messaging functionality in a minimalist interface.
items.title: Tej619/Textify: Textify is a lightweight real-time chat application designed for quick and easy conversations. It allows users to join and chat instantly which is ideal for testing, learning or internal team demos, Textify focuses on core messaging functionality in a minimalist interface.

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight library for extracting geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude) from Google Maps URLs, written in TypeScript. Supports fetching redirected URLs and parsing coordinates.

items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
